Title: The Smudging
Writer: Robia Rashid (created by), D.J. Ryan (staff writer), Dennis Saldua, Bob Smiley (consulting producer)
Actors: Jennifer Jason Leigh, Keir Gilchrist, Brigette Lundy-Paine, Michael Rapaport
Plot: Casey tells Izzie what Nate did. Sam tries to figure out which colleges to apply to. Doug discovers a need to educate first responders about autism.
